fields.title: Vignerons visit: Janots Bos
fields.content:
Janots Bos definitely live up to their motto "The Côte d'Or has all the necessary conditons for perfect wines. It's upto us to make it happen. That's what we do!"  

Founded in 2005, Thierry Janots and Richard Bos have turned their hobby into their work and it shows. 
As always, a visit to this lovely Vigneron near Beaune is a treat and The Winery team wouldn't miss it for the world! We thoroughly enjoyed their wine tasting when we hopped in during our summer wine tour and have brought back some lovely bottles to add to our collection in the shop!

fields.title: The great champagne houses
fields.content:
You can't pass by Epernay, France without a visit to at least one of the great Champagne houses (The Winery team, naturally, visited several during our trip this summer).

Though Moët&Chandon certainly live up to their name with regards to the quality of their well known Champagnes, we would also highly recommend a visit to Mercier's underground tours of their nearly infinite cellars!

fields.title: Why we support locally
fields.content:
We at the Winery are what you would call in French: 'Amateurs de vin', or roughly translated: Lovers of fine wines! This means we not only wish to provide our customers with quality, but we also wish to support the farmers at the very heart of that quality.

As true Amateurs de vin we made it our life's mission to go on a wine tour through various countries at least once a year, a hobby which eventually turned into the shop you know and love today!

We buy our wines directly from the farms, thereby continuing to support small businesses and helping to keep the quality and variety of wines thriving!
